activities: Virgin Pulse provides a social wellness platform, which it licenses to employers ("Clients") to make available to employees ("Members") as a benefit.  Members sign up via Virgin Pulse's platform to access a range of solutions to track various activities from physical activity to nutrition and sleep.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clients provide us with limited personal data about employees for eligibility and membership signup. Members may add personal information to their profile at their option to participate in programs. Tracking information relating to progress is also stored by the platform. Clients may request reports on metrics regarding the level of participation for rewards purposes only. No manual processing.
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using JAMS International as a third party resolution provider.
